title: diff -r: kabooms in ls-tree call
body:
yet to dig out details, just wanted to report so I don't forget where etc

```shell
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ datalad diff -f c10fa46438058e49a5c886e12cc548db94bd9915 -t HEAD  -r
 modified: .heudiconv (dataset)
CommandError: 'git ls-tree e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7 -z -r --full-tree -l' failed with exitcode 128 under /inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv
fatal: not a tree object
```
and everything seems to be "clean":
```shell
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ git status
On branch master
nothing to commit, working tree clean

bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ datalad status
nothing to save, working tree clean
...
```

not sure yet how that specific objectid came about, but FWIW

```shell
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ cd .heudiconv/
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv$ git show e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7
fatal: bad object e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv$ git fsck
Checking object directories: 100% (256/256), done.
dangling blob e69de29bb2d1d6434b8b29ae775ad8c2e48c5391
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv$ git show e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7
fatal: bad object e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv$ cd ..
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ git status
On branch master
nothing to commit, working tree clean
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ git fsck
Checking object directories: 100% (256/256), done.
Checking objects: 100% (6145/6145), done.
dangling blob e69de29bb2d1d6434b8b29ae775ad8c2e48c5391
dangling tree 93750247c99027f5f3023d2786d79b9f120ccd9b
bids@rolando:/inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest$ datalad diff -f c10fa46438058e49a5c886e12cc548db94bd9915 -t HEAD  -r
 modified: .heudiconv (dataset)
CommandError: 'git ls-tree e7faecfa115b683ac3d7cb1e9d293ce74b582ff7 -z -r --full-tree -l' failed with exitcode 128 under /inbox/BIDS/Gobbini/Matteo/1037_budapest/.heudiconv
fatal: not a tree object
```

edit: datalad is current master as of today from singularity image, 0.13.0rc2; initially got this error with 0.12.4 or so
